General.Name: Tonghua Golden-Horse Pharmaceutical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Tonghua Golden-Horse Pharmaceutical Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of traditional Chinese medicine, Chinese and western raw materials, and biochemical preparations in China. The company offers traditional Chinese medicines, such as anticancer, gynecological, Rheumatic, osteopathy, urology, heat-clearing and detoxifying, cardiovascular, digestive, strengthening and tonic, respiratory, diabetes, senses, and pediatric medication products, as well as Western medicines. Tonghua Golden-Horse Pharmaceutical Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Tonghua, China.
